alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Harrison; Panola; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 5:44AM CST until February 01 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Sabine River Near Beckville affecting Panola, Harrison, Rusk and Gregg Counties. For the Sabine River...including Mineola, Hawkins, Gladewater, Longview, Beckville, Logansport...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River Near Beckville. * WHEN...From this evening to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Expect lowland flooding of the heavily wooded floodplain. In addition, oil field operations in and near the floodplain will be affected and steps should be taken to secure petroleum equipment. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM CST Monday the stage was 23.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 26.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.7 feet on 03/30/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued late tonight at 545 AM CST.
